title: Insecure Direct Object Reference
description:
You're logged in as user ID 1001. Your profile URL is:

https://example.com/api/user/1001/profile

You notice the URL contains your user ID. By changing it to another number, you can view other users' profiles:

https://example.com/api/user/1000/profile

This returns the admin's profile with sensitive data.

What is this vulnerability class called? (OWASP abbreviation, 4 letters)

Submit as: flag{abbreviation}
hints: The application uses a direct reference (user ID) in the URL without authorization checks
This is an access control vulnerability where you reference objects directly
